title: Bug 10403: Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure and points the output folder at a bin directory, the system does not confirm if the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
EB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure and points the output folder at a bin directory, the system should confirm if the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a new project
2. Choose an existing directory structure
3. Point the output folder at a bin directory
4. Verify if the system confirms if the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
